channel.title: Consulting on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Consulting on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Talks and Takeaways from the Scene: Part 1
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hey everyone. I went to two cool events in Vietnam recently and I’ve got some fun thoughts to share. Tired of boring tech talk?

item.title: Weekly Consulting Snapshot #9: Bybit Loses $1.5B in Hack, Claude 3.7 Sonnet Drops, and OpenArt Designs Characters
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hey everyone, I’ve got some interesting updates from the tech world to share today. I’ve grouped them into three sections: Top Products, Blockchain, and AI.

item.title: Weekly Consulting Snapshot #8: R1 1776 Goes Open-Source, Cardex Gets Hacked, and Grok-3 Debuts
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Technology is moving fast, and AI and blockchain are at the center of it all. In this blog, we’ll look at some recent news and tools that show how these fields are growing and what that means for the future.

item.title: Weekly Consulting Snapshot #7: 10x AI Cost Reduction, Lyft’s 2026 Robotaxi Milestone, and Solana ETF Buzz
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Welcome to our roundup of the most exciting developments in AI and blockchain. From cutting-edge low-code platforms to the latest Ethereum upgrades, here’s what you need to know.

item.title: Weekly Consulting Snapshot #6: Trending Products, DeepSeek Wave, and Ethereum Predictions
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This recap after Lunar New Year highlights some of the most promising products and companies making an impact, along with key trends in AI and cryptocurrency.

item.title: Weekly Consulting Snapshot #5: VC Trends, Blockchain Breakthroughs, and AI Innovations
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Follow the Money 1. The US: Golden Ticket Why It Matters: The US alone raised $190.7B in VC funding in 2024, more than the rest of the world combined.

item.title: Weekly Consulting Snapshot #4: AI Supercomputers, Mini AI PCs, Worldcoin Expansion, and SEA VC
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: AI Sector Nvidia’s Personal AI Supercomputer: Nvidia has unveiled Digits, a $3,000 desktop AI supercomputer designed for researchers and enthusiasts.

item.title: Weekly Consulting Snapshot #3: AI’s Ubiquity at CES, Wall Street’s AI Boom, and Blockchain Innovations
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: AI sector CES 2025 in Las Vegas was all about artificial intelligence, with Nvidia’s CEO Jensen Huang delivering the keynote and showcasing their latest AI chips for personal computers.

item.title: Weekly Consulting Snapshot #2: AI Talent Wars, OpenAI’s New Models, Hyperliquid’s Rise
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Hey there, another week brings a fresh mix of tech stories worth talking about. Let’s break it down, keep things chill, and see what’s been happening.

item.title: Weekly Consulting Snapshot #1: Gemini 2.0, OpenAI’s Sora, a16z’s Predictions
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: It’s been a busy week in the world of tech, with some huge announcements shaping the future of AI, quantum computing, and beyond.

item.title: Consulting Pitch - Data Integration and AI
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TL;DR Objective: Develop an intelligent system that aggregates data about potential clients, market conditions, and our capabilities to generate targeted consulting pitch outlines through LLM analysis, providing customized solutions that address specific client challenges.

item.title: Kafi Securities: Transforming digital experience for individual investors
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: When Kafi began a comprehensive overhaul of their mobile application for individual investors, they faced a common challenge: the stock trading app’s user experience fails to meet the needs of diverse target user groups.

item.title: What's New in February 2024
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Reporting Tech Signals - Latest findings on Serverless Computing, AI & ML, FinOps and CyberSecurity Research Topics 2024 - 40 topics on the most promising technologies.

item.title: Consultant Growth Track
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: While there is no fixed path in the consulting field, we do have a structured growth guidance for career development, skill enhancement, and professional advancement.

item.title: Consulting - How we work
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Our Approach: Collaborative Expertise Team of Specialists: we favor collective expertise, encouraging knowledge sharing and collaboration, to craft innovative solutions that exceed expectations.

item.title: Consulting - Who should join us
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Consulting teams consists of anyone who’s hungry for more than just coding; those who are curious about the trends, the market, who can introduce new projects / challenges, who care about providing sensible solutions, and who take great care of projects.

item.title: Consulting - Who We Are
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Who we are Dwarves Consulting is team of individuals who possess a combination of technical expertise, problem-solving skills, and strong communication abilities.

item.title: Consulting Team
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Who we are Dwarves Consulting is team of individuals who possess a combination of technical expertise, problem-solving skills, and strong communication abilities.

item.title: Digest
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: This page holds a collection of both our internal and external events, including the things we do with the Labs team, Consulting team, Operations, team, and the community.

item.title: Estimation Guidelines
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: When we conduct an estimation, it is recommended to abandon the transitional “exact hours” assessment method, instead, use the story point based on the Fibonacci number (1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13, 21…).

item.title: Project Delivery Schedule and Guidelines
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Weekly Activities Weekly Points/Effort Report Every Friday Action: Fill out the weekly points/effort report. Link: Weekly Report Spreadsheet. Deadline for Data Sync: Data is sync by EOD next Tuesday.

item.title: Invoice
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)

item.title: NDA
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)

item.title: FBSC
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Budget We do need to know clients’ budgets. This is often uncomfortable for them but their budget helps determines what scope is possible.

item.title: How to work with clients
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: TRAINING COURSE: HOW TO WORK WITH CLIENT What skills that an engineer should have in order to work with client effectively?

item.title: Service Feedbacks
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: GENERAL QUESTIONS FOR SERVICE FEEDBACKS Engineer performances a. Communication How did the engineer interact with your team? How was the communication between the engineer and your team?

item.title: Konvoy: Revolutionizing keg management with innovative technology
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Industry: Logistics, Supply Chain Management Location: Australia Business Context: An innovative company providing beverage industry with a unique keg rental solution, emphasizing sustainability and ease of use.

item.title: CIMB: Initiating a digital wealth management experience
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Industry Fintech Tech stack MySQL, JAVA Spring Boot, and Angular Location South East Asia Solution Fast recruiting senior engineers to collaborate with CIMB’s tech team.

item.title: Swift: Micro frontend design system for e-commerce
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Previously on Why Micro-Frontend, we took a look into what is Micro-Frontend architecture, as well as some core concepts behind it.

item.title: Open Fabric: Set the tech foundation and built an MVP from scratch
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Founded and led by veterans from fintech players like Paypal & Grab, Open Fabric is a BNPL platform, built to enable an open commerce network for customers and credit providers in South East Asia to radically simplify merchant integrations for digital payment methods.

item.title: Spike Inu: Seamless experience for cross-chain swap and decentralized exchange
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief When blockchain becomes the new tech blockbuster, worldwide blockchain networks such as Ethereum, Polygon, Avalanche, Fantom, or Binance Smart Chance started to develop their own tokens.

item.title: Hedge Foundation: A customized all-in-one trading platform for pro traders
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Hedge Foundation is a powerful dashboard to support users in managing crypto account positions, balance, PNL and works on bulk orders for profit and loss tracking.

item.title: Search.io: Development journey with Australia AI Power Search Solutions
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Founded in 2017 and reached a total seed funding of $4M by 2020, Search.io, formerly Sajari, is an AI-powered search and product discovery platform that helps eCommerce brands and retailers maximize their revenue and conversion rates through outcome-focused, real-time search result optimization.

item.title: Tokenomy: Architect Frontend for a crypto investment ecosystem
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Founded in 2017 as an innovation arm of INDODAX, Tokenomy is a crypto investment network through blockchain-enabled tokens.

item.title: BaseHQ: US first-ever platform built for assistants
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Base launched in 2019 out of High Alpha Venture Studio, with a $2.6M funding round led by Matchstick Ventures with participation from Revolution’s Rise of the Rest Seed Fund, High Alpha Capital, and Slack Fund.

item.title: Startupvn: Building a better community
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: startup.vn was founded 10 years ago, when the concept of “startups” was still fairly new in Vietnam. A handful of people from diverse backgrounds joined hands to create a homeland for Vietnamese who aim at building and growing their own businesses.

item.title: Momos: Help build an MVP Shopify for F&B merchandises in Singapore
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Momos is a pre-seed startup operating in Singapore, whose founder was an ex-Grab They look to ship the first MVP with a web platform to test the market and onboard promising users.

item.title: Attrace: Blockchain adoption for Netherland's affiliate marketing platform
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Attrace is a Netherland decentralized affiliate marketing network that audits action and bridges e-commerce websites to merchants. The core concept is applying referral for different blockchain product use cases They seek to launch MVP for market validation and early user acquisition Our team of 3 join them to contribute to Attrace’s core function with custom-made blockchain technology Highlight Blockchain solutions for multiples use-cases Golang for Backend system: Solidity and index blockchain data IPFS as files sharing system GDPR standard for data privacy Fraud detection & verification network The Context Attrace’s concept is a marketing platform that helps merchants feature and advertise their products.

item.title: Setel: Supercharged Malaysia's first pay, pump & go super-app
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief First introduced by PETRONAS in 2018, Setel is the first e-payment solution for fuel purchases directly from mobile devices.

item.title: JoinPara: Empowering healthcare staffing during COVID-19
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Founded in 2019, Para is a platform connecting hospitals with medical professionals. Continuing with Go microservices, we have shipped numerous features, markedly workshift management and candidate screening.

item.title: Relay: Support in shipping their MVP product for US market testing
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Relay is an extension tool that decreases micromanagement by automating workflows. Relay’s first engagement with Dwarves aims to ship their MVP to market as quick as possible for early user acquisition.

item.title: Naru: A browser focus web extension for US market
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Being a digital designer who looks for inspiration and digital trends, Matt hopes for a productivity tool that could lend well to his browsing habit.

item.title: Mudah.my: From monolithic to microservice
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Mudah.my is a Malaysian 12-years-old online marketplace. A product derives from a partnership between Telenor ASA of Norway and 701Search Singapore.

item.title: Reapit: Collaboration with UK residential cloud-based PaaS
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Founded in 1997 and has having 22 years in the market, Reapit is the largest CRM and Client Accounting software provider to the UK residential real estate sector.

item.title: Aharooms: Vietnam hospitality growth solutions
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Aharooms wants to be a remarkable Vietnamese brand in franchised hotel chains. They look to enter the affordable hotel market to support business owners.

item.title: beGroup: Augmented team to ship beCorporate services
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Getting the early funding for over 40M US dollar, beGroup focuses to roll out all 4 products by the end of 2018.

item.title: AirWatt: Apply AI/ML for IoT electricity usage solutions
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief AirWatt is an IoT solution that integrates and monitors electricity usage using AI/ML. AirWatt’s vision is to help businesses track electric usage status of electrical equipment.

item.title: Voconic: A web-based cloud tool developed in partnership with Google
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief CJC Ptd is a 20-year expert in providing market data consultancy & professional services for global financial sector.

item.title: Setting The Budget
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: One of the most important questions at the start of a project is how much it will cost. It is vital to make sure that enough budget is available to allow for the development of a viable product.

item.title: Sol: Planning app part 1
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction The following case study is my first app design project. In this project, I have gone through the design process, including interviews, analysis, user flows, wireframes, prototyping, and user testing.

item.title: Sol: Travel planning app part 3
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Today we shall continue our series of designing “Sol-Travel Planning” app. As we mentioned our process on UX research and UI design in the last two articles, Sol’s target users are the young so keeping the app fun with interaction is a must.

item.title: Sol: Travel planning app part 2
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Following the previous article on UX case study of Sol — Travel App, an app that was tailored to meet the needs of groups on traveling days.

item.title: Dental Marketplace: Digitalize the Singapore dentistry operation process
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: In brief Founded by Desmond Goh - a Singaporean dental surgeon, Dental Marketplace is an online platform for dental professionals to stay active in dentistry and simplify operation process.

item.title: Fixed Budget Scope Controlled
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Fixed-Budget, Scope-Controlled (FBSC) is applied at Atomic Object. They build custom software for our customers. Because of the complexity involved in building a great software product, software development projects are always more difficult to price than a product.

item.title: BHD Cinema: Redesign BHD's booking ticket app
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction BHD is one of the biggest cinema chains in Vietnam with hundreds of thousands tickets sold monthly. However, its mobile application is a complete drawback; users cannot book tickets online, it feels and looks outdated, inconsistent and cluttered.
